Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/54th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/54th.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track condition near the area of Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track condition near the area of Hamlin.

  • Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service from Howard to Dempster-Skokie in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #97 Skokie buses.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
